Admonishing Whisper.name: Admonishing Whisper
Admonishing Whisper.flavor: You whisper a single word of power, and your enemies reel back from its might, deafened by it and admonished to do no more harm to your friends.
Admonishing Whisper.onHit: 3d6 + Wisdom modifier damage, and you push the target 2 squares. The target is deafened until the end of your next turn. If the target is then adjacent to a bloodied ally, the target is also dazed until the end of your next turn.

Whisper of Doom.name: Whisper of Doom
Whisper of Doom.flavor: You whisper an ancient curse of dire potency against your enemies.
Whisper of Doom.onHit: 3d8 + Wisdom modifier damage. The target takes ongoing 10 damage and is weakened (save ends both).
